plot: A generous boy tries to help a girl who does not believe in Santa Claus because of her family's poverty.
title: A Little Girl Who Did Not Believe in Santa Claus
plot_es: A generous boy tries to help a girl who does not believe in Santa Claus because of her family's poverty.
original_name: A Little Girl Who Did Not Believe in Santa Claus
plot_en: A generous boy tries to help a girl who does not believe in Santa Claus because of her family's poverty.
